name: Merlin vs Zombies
description: Here is a game in which you have to use the fireballs to destroy enemies. Defend your castle with a variety of magical ballistic missiles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 500 MB available space
